home.label: A growing suite of fast, reliable tools
home.subLabel: Built for simplicity and performance. New tools are added regularly to help users stay productive and get things done—without distractions or clutter
home.title: Free online tools
home.description: Explore fast, free online tools for everyday tasks. Rivine Tools provides a seamless experience with privacy-focused web utilities—constantly expanding to meet your needs.

qrCodeGenerator.title: QR Code Generator Free
qrCodeGenerator.label: QR Code Generator
qrCodeGenerator.navDescription: Create QR codes for URLs, text, phone numbers, and more.
qrCodeGenerator.subNavDescription: Generate all types of QR codes in one place.
qrCodeGenerator.description: Generate QR codes instantly with our free online QR code generator. Customize with colors, logos, and high-quality downloads.
qrCodeGenerator.autoGenerationMessage: Your QR Code will be generated automatically

url.label: URL
url.title: Free QR Code Generator | Generate Custom QR Codes Online
url.description: Easily generate and customize QR codes for URLs. Ideal for sharing online content, directing traffic, or enhancing print materials. Fast, free, and no signup required.

text.label: Text
text.navDescription: Encode plain text into QR codes.
text.title: Free QR Code Generator for Text | Create Custom Text QR Codes
text.description: Easily generate and customize QR codes for text messages. Perfect for sharing information quickly and efficiently. Fast, free, and no signup required.

phone.label: Phone
phone.navDescription: Generate QR codes to dial a number.
phone.title: Free QR Code Generator for Phone Numbers | Create Custom Phone QR Codes
phone.description: Easily generate and customize QR codes for phone numbers. Ideal for sharing contact information instantly. Fast, free, and no signup required.

clock.title: Clock
clock.label: Clock
clock.navDescription: Set timers for a variety of tasks and activities.
clock.subNavDescription: Efficiently manage your time with our comprehensive online timer.
clock.description: Utilize our versatile online timer to track time for tasks, workouts, and more. Customize alerts and durations to suit your needs.

timer.title: Online Timer
timer.label: Timer
timer.navDescription: Set timers for various tasks and activities.
timer.subNavDescription: Manage your time effectively with our online timer.
timer.description: Use our free online timer to keep track of time for tasks, workouts, and more. Customize alerts and durations.

passwordGenerator.title: Password Generator Free
passwordGenerator.label: Password Generator
passwordGenerator.navDescription: Create secure and random passwords to protect your accounts.
passwordGenerator.subNavDescription: Instantly generate strong and unique passwords.
passwordGenerator.description: Use our free online password generator to create secure and random passwords. Customize the length and characters to meet your security needs.

moderate.label: Moderate
moderate.message: Not bad, but not Fort Knox either.

passwordGenerator.autoGenerationMessage: Your password will be generated automatically

length.label: Length
length.title: Secure Password Generator | Customize Password Length
length.description: Choose your password length to ensure adequate security. Recommended: at least 12 characters.

characters.label: Characters
characters.navDescription: Select the types of characters to include.
characters.title: Secure Password Generator | Customize Password Characters
characters.description: Select the types of characters you want to include in your password: letters, numbers, symbols.

textToHandwriting.title: Text to Handwriting Free
textToHandwriting.label: Text to Handwriting
textToHandwriting.subNavDescription: Transform your text into beautiful handwriting.
textToHandwriting.description: Use our tool to convert text into realistic handwriting styles. Customize fonts and sizes.

text.title: Text Suite
text.label: Text
text.navDescription: Access a comprehensive suite of text tools for all your text processing needs.
text.subNavDescription: Explore a variety of tools to manage, compare, and analyze text.
text.description: Our Text Tools Suite offers a wide range of utilities to handle text processing tasks efficiently. From comparison to analysis, customize your experience to meet your specific requirements.

textCompare.title: Text Compare Free
textCompare.label: Text Compare
textCompare.navDescription: Compare two texts to identify differences and similarities.
textCompare.subNavDescription: Effortlessly compare and analyze text differences.

textCompare.autoComparisonMessage: Your texts will be compared automatically
